description: Learn the fundamentals of typography with Typoversity. Discover how good typesetting works in small bite-sized lessons and then apply what you have learned in interactive challenges. Made for iPad. This project is open-source, check out the GitHub link.

title: GeekCV.io
blurb: Create resumes with ease
description: Create your professional bio using this service. You can create endless resumes for your family and you, upload photos, show your Github repositories and Stackoverflow stats. One-man startup.
